com.marathon

Class XMLRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marathon.MarathonEventType
      • com.marathon.XMLRun

  • public class XMLRun
extends MarathonEventType
    Class Simulating marathon race between multiple participants. All runner information is fetched from xml file placed under 'Resources' folder of eclipse project.
    Author:
    Uma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLRun()
      Default constructor that considers FinalXMLData.xml for getting runners information.
      XMLRun(java.lang.String fileName)
      constructor that considers user input xml file for getting runners information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scheduleMarathon()
      Schedule marathon for runners whose data is fetched from xml file.

        Default constructor that considers FinalXMLData.xml for getting runners information.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleMarathon

        public void scheduleMarathon()
        Schedule marathon for runners whose data is fetched from xml file. Function creates and starts thread for each runner and waits for the marathon to finish.
        Specified by:
        scheduleMarathon in class MarathonEventType
